# OperationQueue.SchedulerTimeType.Stride

**Structure**

The interval by which operation queue times advance.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Stride
```

## Managing Stride Properties

- **timeInterval**: The value of this time interval, in seconds.
- **magnitude**: The value of this time interval, in seconds.

## Creating Scheduler Time Strides

- **init(_:)**: Creates a stride using the specified time interval.

## Managing Scheduler Time Type Properties

- **date**: The date this type represents.
- **advanced(by:)**: Calculates an operation queue scheduler time by advancing the scheduler time type’s date by the given interval.
- **distance(to:)**: The distance to another operation queue scheduler time.

## Conforms To

- Comparable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByFloatLiteral
- ExpressibleByIntegerLiteral
- Numeric
- SchedulerTimeIntervalConvertible
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SignedNumeric
